thread.title: Texas Governor Trashes Cowboys Defense

author: Thomas Duffy
title: Texas Governor Trashes Cowboys Defense
text:
Texas Governor Trashes Cowboys Defense Bleacher Report 3 hrs ago Thomas Duffy © Twitter Texas Gov. Greg Abbott posted a bold tweet during Sunday night’s game between the Dallas Cowboys and New Orleans Saints.
AdChoices He said that Big D’s defense was “more porous than the Texas border.”
*#%>¥! @Cowboy defense. More porous than the Texas border.
— Greg Abbott (@GregAbbott_TX) October 5, 2015 Keep in mind, this is coming from a guy whose campaign was based on securing the Lone Star State’s border.
Accordingly, Twitter unloaded on him:
@GregAbbott_TX congrats. You are the most embarrassing Texas governor since our last one. Take a bow.
— amandacobra (@amandacobra) October 5, 2015 @GregAbbott_TX @cowboy You are an embarrassment to Texas... so are the Cowgirls. *snickers*
— EriKa with a K! (@QueenzQT) October 5, 2015 @GregAbbott_TX Mr. Abbot think your great but we got a problem if your letting Texas have a porous border. Aren't you suppose to fix that?
— Second amendment (@AmendmentSecond) October 5, 2015 @GregAbbott_TX aren't you in charge of that border?
— Micah Wiener (@micahwiener) October 5, 2015 @GregAbbott_TX @cowboy pic.twitter.com/xQrMDxrJNy
— Steven (@lllSMSlll) October 5, 2015 @GregAbbott_TX https://t.co/ytSSHVrV6d
— Chad Chavez (@ChadAChavez) October 5, 2015 The Cowboys lost to the Saints in overtime, 26-20, after allowing Drew Brees to hook up with C.J. Spiller on an 80-yard touchdown pass.
[Twitter]
